page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment in the area is mainly in { {farming and industry}. { Farming includes: Beef cattle. Dairy cattle. Apple growing. A small area is used for market gardening ,growing lettuce and cabbages.{ {Idustries include:} Food Processing. Light Engineering. Plastics Manufacture. Furniture Manufacture. Electrical Components. Picture Framing. Carpet Manufacturing. Carpet manufacturing is carried on at the {Ulster Carpet Mills.}Carpets and tweeds of a very high quality are made.The products are sold worldwide.
